title: Random DC from PVP
body:
I am constantly getting disconnected for between 5-30 seconds at random times.

Sometimes during champion select, but also in-game and just at the home screen.

Any advice?

replies.body: http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/ What does this have to say about your connection?

yea i cop that too, i started helping jungle and i lagged out and stole his first creep, thn the rage started.
i get rolling DCs all the time for half the game, ended up on a prioity que for 5 games, and nothing riots doing to try to help us.
